addHook(bytes4,address).details: Callable only by the contract itself

params.implementation: The implementation address of the hook

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.ids: The list of token IDs being transferred
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer
params.values: The amounts of each token being transferred

returns._0: On a success, the selector of the function that was called

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer
params.tokenId: The ID of the token being transferred
params.value: The amount of token being transferred

returns._0: On a success, the selector of the function that was called

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer
params.tokenId: The ID of the token being transferred

returns._0: On a success, the selector of the function that was called
implementation The implementation address of the hook

removeHook(bytes4).details: Callable only by the contract itself

params.from: The address which previously owned the tokens
params.value: The amount of tokens being transferred

returns._0: The signature of the function to be called

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred
params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the tokens
params.operator: The address which initiated the transfer
params.operatorData: Additional data with no specified format
params.to: The address which is receiving the tokens
